body: Jin before every sex scene.. damn it 😂

@anjel I took it as the author implying that Jin and Lanka get together later. But as for Hitomi, I didn't see anything concrete where she will end up with Yena. A tease at the end, possibly, but that has been happening all throughout the series with nothing ever developing between them. Nothing was resolved about Hitomi's feelings for Jin or if either Hitomi and Yena were even willing to entertain the idea of them becoming closer. Even in the future time loop Hitomi and Yena weren't stated to be any closer than they already were so without any strong hints I don't see them getting together later. So for me, the end is open ended other than Jin and Lanka, hell even a harem for Jin could happen since nothing concrete was shown at the end for the rest of the other girls.

Ok @Homosexual fire of the north. The author made Jin and Lanka realize they were best as friends, as well as made it clear that Hitomi and Jin had mutual romantic feelings. Then the author backtracked this growth and paired Jin and Lanka together, while Hitomi gets with a tomboy Hyena (I forgot her name, but she's still a pretty cool character).
Alguien que me explique el final del manga y porque fue tan malo? /Someone explain me the ending of the manga so i can understand why it was so bad?
You don't know how happy I am to see this in NHentai, or in existence
Nice to see this series get another doujin!  Great art!
Better than the actual ending of the story
Voy a fingir que este fue el final del manga y no la porquería que nos dieron.
